title:
There\'s a new traffic camera being installed on the west side of the Cape Fear Memorial Bridge (Feb. 8, 2010) Will I be able to access live video/photos to see if traffic is backed up between Wilmington and Leland? If so, what\'s the web address?

Thanks!

Justin
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=6065
